name: Tabbouleh
keywords: bulgur wheat, italian parsley, tomato, raw, summer
recipeIngredient: 1 cucumber, peeled, seeded and finely chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Place the bulgur in a bowl with cold water to cover and allow it to soften for 2 to 3 hours. Wrap in a clean kitchen towel and drain.

Drain excess liquid from the tomatoes and cucumber. In a large bowl, combine the bulgur, tomatoes, cucumber, onion, mint and parsley. Add the lemon juice, oil and salt and mix well. Refrigerate for at least 1 hour.
